member.name: M:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.Form1.ShowTabTip
member.summary: 通过Process Start的方法调出touchkeyboard，前提是任务管理器中这个进程已经结束

member.name: M:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.Form1.HideTabTip
member.summary: 通过结束进程的方式关闭显示

member.name: M:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.Form1.caretposition
member.summary: 范围当前插入符光标的位置，如果不在文本框内会返回（0，0）

member.name: M:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.Form1.ClickTabTip_TaskBar
member.summary: 模拟鼠标按右下角Touch keyboard按键，必须右键任务栏在show touch keyboar button上打勾

member.name: M:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.Form1.IsTabTipOpen
member.summary: 判断虚拟键盘是否显示

member.name: M:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.Form1.IsCaretExist
member.summary: 通过GetGUIThreadInfo可以得到当前焦点窗口的数据，可以从guiThreadInfo中获取 在下面链接可以查到这个结构体的参数的含义 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/api/winuser/ns-winuser-tagguithreadinfo

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:TouchKeyboardAutoPopUp.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
